payload.title: Add test checksum test coverage for CycleRecord
payload.description:
Expand the test suite in `crypto/checksum.test.ts` to cover the `CycleRecord` type.

## Requisitos Funcionales (EARS)

- WHEN calculatePayloadChecksum is invoked on two `CycleRecord` objects with identical data but different key order, THE SYSTEM SHALL produce the exact same checksum.
- WHEN a `CycleRecord` payload is created for the test, IT SHALL be a complete and valid object according to `cycle_record_schema.yaml`.
